data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Rollout Complete
data.Description: Google has confirmed that the August 2024 core update has finished rolling out, taking 19 days to complete. The update was expected to take a month but ended up taking less than 3 weeks to roll out.

data.Title: Google Trends Email Subscriptions to End October 29th
data.Description: Google Trends will discontinue its email subscription option for trend notifications starting October 29, 2024. Users will no longer be able to create new trend alerts or receive existing ones.

data.Title: Bing Introduces Interactive Animation for Featured Snippets and Knowledge Panels
data.Description: Microsoft's Bing Search introduces an interactive animation for featured snippets and knowledge panels. Hovering over the table of contents highlights the corresponding section within the answer box.

data.Title: Google Tests New Map Pin Design
data.Description: Google tests new map pin design

data.Title: Google Search Now Supports AVIF Image File Types
data.Description: Google Search now supports AVIF image file types after much anticipation and wait.

data.Title: Google Testing New Shopping Search Interface on Mobile
data.Description: Google is testing a new shopping search interface on mobile.

data.Title: Google Analytics 4 Benchmarking Data and Reports Now Available
data.Description: Google Analytics 4 benchmarking data and reports are now available.

data.Title: Google Ads Product Category-Level Insights Released
data.Description: Google Ads product category-level insights have been released.

data.Title: Google Search Testing Accordion User Experience for "You Visit Often"
data.Description: Google Search is testing an accordion user experience, instead of a label, for "you visit often."

data.Title: Google Updates Canonical Documentation: Don't Specify a Fragment URL
data.Description: Google updates its canonical documentation to say "Don't specify a fragment URL as canonical, as Google generally doesn't support fragment URLs."

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Q&A Feature Disabled in India
data.Description: The Google Business Profiles Q&A feature is reportedly disabled in India.

data.Title: Microsoft Advertising Announces 5 New Features
data.Description: Microsoft Advertising has announced 5 new features, with a focus on search ads.

data.Title: Google Image Search "From This Image" Refinement Released
data.Description: Google has released a refinement for its "from this image" image search feature.

data.Title: GA4 Report Update: Visualize Up to 5 Rows of Data in Detail Reports
data.Description: GA4 report update - You can now visualize up to 5 rows of data directly within your detail reports using plot rows.
